message.content:
Yes, you can use Telegram on your Chromebook. Since there is no native app for Chrome OS specifically, you have two options to access Telegram on a Chromebook:

1. Use the web version: Simply visit https://web.telegram.org/ in Google Chrome or any web browser of your choice, log in with your phone number and enjoy using Telegram.

2. Install the Android app (for compatible devices): Some newer Chromebooks have support for Android apps through the Google Play Store. If this is available on your device follow these steps:
   a) Open up the Google Play Store.
   b) Search for "Telegram".
   c) Install Telegram X or Telegram Messenger from by clicking 'Install'.
   d) After installation, open and sign-in using your phone number.

Now you're ready to chat away!
